headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  PERLMUTTER, STEPHEN DAVID

snippet: PERLMUTTER--Stephen David, passed away on January 17, 2016 at the age of 68. A loving husband, father, brother, and friend. He is survived by his wife Diane, his daughters Jaclyn and Caren, and his sisters Iris and Susan. A lifetime New Yorker, Stephen grew up in the Bronx, graduated from Bronx Science, CCNY, and Brooklyn Law School, and served the State of New York as an Administrative Law Judge. Stephen was a history buff, a lover of comedies, and an appreciator of musicals. He will be greatly missed. The family extends their gratitude to the physicians and staff at Memorial Sloan Kettering, where donations can be made in Steve's honor. 1/3
